entries.name: errors
entries.desc: Errors encountered attempting to find the gem.

entries.name: name
entries.desc: The name of the gem that could not be found.

entries.name: version
entries.desc: The version of the gem that could not be found.

entries.name: new(name, version, errors=nil)
entries.desc: Creates a new SpecificGemNotFoundException for a gem with the given name and version.  Any errors encountered when attempting to find the gem are also stored.
